The Quranic researcher, I ask forgiveness from your Lord with the repentance of disbelief and sins, so they will be given it (not (forgive him) It was a always forgiving forgiveness, many of them for the reports, as if they were rising and said that if we were on the right, then how do we leave it, and if we were on the falsehood, then we are in falsehood Just and after what we have worked on for a long time, he commanded them what he attached to what he preferred from them from the tin To them and fall into their hearts of other things, I mean what you include, sending the sky, etc., and I answered them for that, because they came to him.And the soul is fond of the love of the urgent, Qutdah said: They were the people of love for the world, so he called them to the hereafter from the way they loved and said when he lied to him, peace be upon him The ritual of the supplication is the love of God, the dirt, and the sterilization of the wombs of their women for four years, and seventy years were said, so they will promise them if they are safe.The shame and defends them from what they are in, and it is his saying that sends the sky on you with a darkening (P-73), that is, the many dar, and the seen and the sky of the clouds or the rain, and the rain, and the later, The plant is also its saying: If the sky descends with the land of the people that we intended, and if they were angry and it is permissible to want the umbrella to it, the umbrella is what you have heard, and it is not the same Its and described it with a renant, except that the formula of all of them is, as he stated that his Sibuyeh was declared in it, the male and female.In the sea, a verb is not attached to the vitae except rarely.
